code:
module TopModule (
    input logic a,
    input logic b,
    input logic c,
    input logic d,
    output logic q
);

always @(*) begin
    q = (a & b & ~c & ~d) | (a & b & ~c & d) | (a & b & c & ~d) | (a & b & c & d) |
        (a & ~b & c & d) | (~a & b & c & d) | (a & ~b & ~c & d) | (a & ~b & c & ~d);
end

endmodule

        (a & ~b & c & d) | (~a & b & c & d) | (a & ~b & ~c & d) | (a & ~b & c & ~d);
end

endmodule
